forum.content:
不知不覺重聽好多次。
歌詞：
In my dreams. I fell you light.
I fell love is born again. Fire flies.
In the moonlight. Rising stars. Remember.
The day. I fell in love with you. Darling won't you break. My hart.
Take my hand now. Stay close to me. Be my lover. Won't you let me go.
Close my eyes now. And you will see. There's a rainbow.
For you and me. As I wake up.
I see your face. I fell love is born again.
Cherry blossom. Flying birds.
In the sky. Can't you see. The sun.
That is shining on the fields. Is it shining in your hart. Take my hand now. Stay close to me. Be my lover. Won't you let me go.
Close my eyes now. And you will see. There's a rainbow. For you and me.
And I dream of you every night.
Cause's there only you. In my mind.
Will you be a stranger or a friend in my mind.
Darling won't you break. My hart.
Take my hand now. Stay close to me. Be my lover. Won't you let me go.
Close my eyes now. And you will see. There's a rainbow. For you and me.
Take my hand now. Stay close to me.
Be my lover. Won't you let me go. Close my eyes now. And you will see. There's a rainbow. For you and me.

在我的夢裡。我跌倒了你光。我覺得愛重生。

火蒼蠅。在月光下。冉冉升起的新星。還記得。

這一天。我愛上了你。親愛的你不會打破。我的鹿。

現在牽我的手。在靠近我。做我的愛人。你不會讓我走。

現在閉上眼睛。你會看到。有一道彩虹。

你和我。當我醒來的時候。我看到你的臉。我覺得愛重生。

櫻花盛開。飛翔的鳥。在天空中。你看不見。太陽。

發出的光芒在田野上。它在你的哈特閃閃發亮。現在牽我的手。在靠近我。做我的愛人。你不會讓我走。

現在閉上眼睛。你會看到。有一道彩虹。

你和我。我每晚都在夢見你。因為有的只有你。
在我的腦海。你將一個陌生人或朋友在我的腦海中。
親愛的你不會打破。我的鹿。現在牽我的手。在靠近我。做我的愛人。你不會讓我走。現在閉上眼睛。你會看到。有一道彩虹。你和我。現在牽我的手。在靠近我。做我的愛人。你不會讓我走。現在閉上眼睛。你會看到。有一道彩虹。你和我。

urls.title: DAISHI DANCE - Take Me Hands feat.Cecile Corbel

forum.title: 超空靈的人聲Take my hand Cecile cornel
